Text: Neon, can you tell me if these are iTunes/ATV compatible? I've been struggling to find decent sources since HolyRoses stopped.
sorry i dont know....best thing to do is download the sample and try it out
@BlueTak I downloaded both of neon's in time video and they were not capable of playing on Atv but worked on itunes fine.

Thanks. I downloaded this torrent, and both the sample and full MP4 file worked on ATV2.

Also, 7 other samples worked (including In Time), so I will begin getting those full files too.

I'm only getting 'Release Lounge' sources.
when did Holyroses stop posting new movies ?
HR is only taking a break...he will be back when he's ready :)

No problem. I wasnt to sure if the Release Lounge would work but thanks for letting us know.

A good idea to try out the samples instead of downloading the full movie and it not working.
I just tried a sample and it would not work on the 1st ATV.. not to sure why.

I've tried several of these on ATV2, they work, but aren't smooth (assume something to do with frame rate?). 

Shame, as they look great quality, and sound good.
I believe your right about the frame rate. Still trying  other mp4 releases to test that may work
YIFY seems to be the next best to HR at the moment, although not quite as good, they play flawlessly. (720, not 1080).

Btw thanks for the videos neon. 

I will see if YIFY's 720 videos work.

His are smaller files and they do convert to my ATV.
Thanks BlueTak.
I guess the ATV2 is compatible with the these files. YIFY's movies sync but i dont get and video out on sound..
